page.title: 20Men on the Farm in Langford
page.content: A man working on a farm in the area, with some experience, could expect to earn about 100 pounds a week basic, not including overtime. This would be for a forty hour week. In the summer his hours would be nearer 60 per week. On the farms in this area he could expect to be offered a house with no rent or rates to pay. The jobs on the farms are numerous. Here are some that you would find in this area: tractor driving, ploughing, combining, cowman, cutting grasss, cleaning out, moving bales, cutting hedges, feeding, and so on. Safety on the farm is important for all the workers.Over the last ten years one farm in the area one man was hurt when a tractor turned over, another was nearly suffocated when some bales fell on him and another hurt his hand when a cow knocked him against a rail.
